articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Face shields, plexiglass barriers 'a waste of money' in Covid-19 battle: US aerosol expert - The Star Online
articles.description: MANILA (Philippine Daily Inquirer/Asia News Network): Instead of face shields and plexiglass barriers, the Philippines should rely more on protective masks and proper ventilation, and even going outdoors, an American aerosol expert said.
articles.content: MANILA (Philippine Daily Inquirer/Asia News Network): Instead of face shields and plexiglass barriers, the Philippines should rely more on protective masks and proper ventilation, and even going outd… [+3080 chars]

articles.author: Barbara Miller
articles.title: Omicron is forcing many Americans to dump their cloth masks for N95s. Should Australians follow? - ABC News
articles.description: With Omicron sweeping the world, many experts say it's time to dump the cloth mask. The best masks to protect you are already available, but here's what you should do if your local pharmacist is out of N95 masks.
articles.content:
Cloth masks quickly became a staple of the pandemic, a bright splash of colour in otherwise grim times. 
However, the humble face covering is in danger of becoming Omicron's latest casualty.
In the… [+7215 chars]

articles.title: Avoid Canada, American travellers warned - National Post
articles.description: The State Department revised its travel advisory, which had been at Level 3, 'reconsider travel,' to Level 4: 'Do not travel to Canada due to COVID-19'
